original_title: 少女☆歌劇 レヴュースタァライト -The LIVE ONLINE-
overview: Revue Starlight -The LIVE ONLINE- was a short stage play screened at AEON Cinema Makuhari Shintoshin and streamed online through eplus on July 12th, 2020. It serves as a prequel for the third stage play, which was postponed from July 2020 to July 2021. It was directed by Akiko Kodama and written by Kaori Miura.
title: Revue Starlight ―The LIVE ONLINE―
